899020.name: Chiptune DJ
899020.description:
Be a DJ in this chiptune based Rhythm game. Play with mouse and keyboard and improve your coordination skills while listening retro chiptune music with beatifull pixel art backgrounds that move on beats.

- More than 12 chiptune songs to play
- Various difficulties for each skill level
- Pixel art backgrounds for each song
- Track your progress with highscores
- Try to get Perfect performance by not missing any notes
- Mouse+keyboard gameplay
- Easy mode avaible if you find it too difficult
- Might continue adding more songs in the future
